pr_title: fix(TBD-10799): HDI4.0:  DI tHiveConnection does not show any fields

timeline.bodyText: Don't we miss a closing parenthesis ? And I don't understand how adding a AND makes the condition become true
timeline.author: lbourgeois
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -67,7 +67,7 @@
 		</PARAMETER>
 		<PARAMETER NAME="HIVE_SERVER" FIELD="CLOSED_LIST" NUM_ROW="15"
 			REQUIRED="true" GROUP="CONNECTION" REPOSITORY_VALUE="HIVE_SERVER"
-			SHOW_IF="(DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[]">
+			SHOW_IF="(DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR (DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].doSupportHive2[] AND !DISTRIB[DISTRIBUTION, HIVE_VERSION].isExecutedThroughWebHCat[]">
